Key Match Events: Georges Mikautadze scored a penalty in the 45'+4' to give Georgia the lead
Patrik Schick equalized for Czech Republic in the 59'
Post-Match Reflections: Both teams probably need to win their final Group F game to stand any chance of advancing
Miscellaneous Highlights: Georgia took their first point of the tournament in a 1-1 draw
The match was played at the Volksparkstadion in Hamburg, Germany with an attendance of 46,524
Others: The match ended 1-1 with Georgia and Czech Republic both earning 1 point each in Group F
